words.source: H7760 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of שִׂים 'to set, put'; KJV 'appointed', ESV 'set', NASB 'set'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H4150 n.ms moʿed 'appointed time, meeting'; KJV 'a set time', ESV 'a time', NASB 'a definite time'
H559 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'saying', ESV 'saying', NASB 'saying'
H4279 n.ms machar 'tomorrow'; KJV 'to morrow', ESV 'tomorrow', NASB 'tomorrow'
H6213 Qal impf. 3ms of עָשָׂה 'to do, make'; KJV 'shall do', ESV 'will do', NASB 'will do'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H1697 art. + n.ms davar 'word, thing'; KJV 'this thing', ESV 'this thing', NASB 'this thing'
H2088 art. + dem. pron. ms zeh 'this'; KJV 'this', ESV 'this', NASB 'this'
H776 prep. b- + art. + n.fs ʾerets 'land, earth'; KJV 'in the land', ESV 'in the land', NASB 'in the land'
